name: netvisor
description: NetVisor is a self-hosted network visualization and analytics tool that provides charts and insights into network activity, bandwidth usage, and device behavior with a beautiful UI.

features.title: Network Visualization
features.description: Interactive charts and graphs display network activity and traffic patterns

features.title: Bandwidth Monitoring
features.description: Track data usage by device, protocol, or time period for capacity planning

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View detailed statistics for each connected device including traffic and connections

features.title: Traffic Analysis
features.description: Identify bandwidth-heavy applications and services consuming network resources

features.title: Historical Data
features.description: Store and review network metrics over time to identify trends and anomalies

features.title: Beautiful Ui
features.description: Modern, intuitive interface makes complex network data easy to understand

features.title: Real-Time
features.description: Live dashboards refresh automatically to show current network state

features.title: Protocol Breakdown
features.description: See traffic distribution across HTTP, HTTPS, DNS, and other protocols
